languages.text: Когда протекторат фон Валанциус погибал под ударами возмездия возмущенных обитателей Простора, многие слуги Вольного Торговца нашли убежище и новое ремесло в рядах этой влиятельной организации. Миссия Касбаллики умела помнить добро.

When the von Valancius protectorate perished under the retaliatory strikes of resentful citizens of the Expanse, many servants of the Rogue Trader found sanctuary and a new way of life in this powerful organisation. The Kasballica Mission did not forget the kindness shown to it.
languages.original_text: Когда протекторат фон Валанциус погибал под ударами возмездия возмущенных обитателей Простора, многие слуги Вольного Торговца нашли убежище и новое ремесло в рядах этой влиятельной организации. Миссия Касбаллики умела помнить добро.

traits.locale_text: When von Valancius' protectorate died under the retaliation strikes of the resentful citizens of the Expanse, many servants of the Rogue Trader found haven and new craft in this powerful organisation. Kasballica Mission did not forget the kindness shown to it.

When von Valancius' protectorate died under the retaliation strikes of the resentful citizens of the Expanse, many servants of the Rogue Trader found haven and new craft in this powerful organisation. Kasballica Mission did not forget the kindness shown to it.

When von Valancius' protectorate perished under the retaliatory strikes of resentful citizens of the Expanse, many servants of the Rogue Trader found sanctuary and a new way of life in this powerful organisation. The Kasballica Mission did not forget the kindness shown to it.

When the von Valancius protectorate perished under the retaliatory strikes of resentful citizens of the Expanse, many servants of the Rogue Trader found sanctuary and a new way of life in this powerful organisation. The Kasballica Mission did not forget the kindness shown to it.

When the von Valancius protectorate perished under the retaliatory strikes of resentful citizens of the Expanse, many servants of the Rogue Trader found sanctuary and a new way of life in this powerful organisation. The Kasballica Mission did not forget the kindness shown to it.

languages.text: 当冯·瓦兰修斯王朝在扩区其他势力的报复性袭击中灭亡时，行商浪人的众多仆人都在这个强大的组织中得到了庇护，找到了新的生活方式。卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团并没有忘记王朝对它的善意。
languages.original_text: When the von Valancius protectorate perished under the retaliatory strikes of resentful citizens of the Expanse, many servants of the Rogue Trader found sanctuary and a new way of life in this powerful organisation. The Kasballica Mission did not forget the kindness shown to it.

traits.locale_text: 当冯·瓦兰修斯王朝在扩区其他势力的报复性袭击中灭亡时，行商浪人的众多仆人都在这个强大的组织中得到了庇护，找到了新的生活方式。卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团并没有忘记王朝对它的善意。

languages.text: Als das Protektorat von Valancius durch die Vergeltungsschläge rachsüchtiger Bürger der Ausdehnung verendete, fanden viele Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} in dieser mächtigen Organisation Zuflucht und ein neues Leben. Die Kasballica-Mission vergaß nicht, welche Güte ihr gezeigt worden war.
languages.original_text: When the von Valancius protectorate perished under the retaliatory strikes of resentful citizens of the Expanse, many servants of the Rogue Trader found sanctuary and a new way of life in this powerful organisation. The Kasballica Mission did not forget the kindness shown to it.

traits.locale_text: Als das Protektorat von Valancius durch die Vergeltungsschläge rachsüchtiger Bürger der Ausdehnung verendete, fanden viele Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} in dieser mächtigen Organisation Zuflucht und ein neues Leben. Die Kasballica-Mission vergaß nicht, welche Güte ihr gezeigt worden war.

languages.text: Lorsque le protectorat von Valancius tomba sous les frappes de représailles des citoyens amers des Étendues, de nombreux serviteurs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} trouvèrent un refuge et une nouvelle vie au sein de la puissante organisation. La Mission de la Kasballica n'avait pas oublié la bonté qui lui avait été témoignée.
languages.original_text: When the von Valancius protectorate perished under the retaliatory strikes of resentful citizens of the Expanse, many servants of the Rogue Trader found sanctuary and a new way of life in this powerful organisation. The Kasballica Mission did not forget the kindness shown to it.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le protectorat von Valancius tomba sous les frappes de représailles des citoyens amers des Étendues, de nombreux serviteurs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} trouvèrent un refuge et une nouvelle vie au sein de la puissante organisation. La Mission de la Kasballica n'avait pas oublié la bonté qui lui avait été témoignée.

languages.text: Cuando el protectorado von Valancius cayó bajo la venganza de los ciudadanos resentidos de la Extensión, muchos sirvientes de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente encontraron refugio y una nueva vida en esta poderosa organización. La misión Kasballica no olvidó la generosidad que se le había demostrado.
languages.original_text: When the von Valancius protectorate perished under the retaliatory strikes of resentful citizens of the Expanse, many servants of the Rogue Trader found sanctuary and a new way of life in this powerful organisation. The Kasballica Mission did not forget the kindness shown to it.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el protectorado von Valancius cayó bajo la venganza de los ciudadanos resentidos de la Extensión, muchos sirvientes de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente encontraron refugio y una nueva vida en esta poderosa organización. La misión Kasballica no olvidó la generosidad que se le había demostrado.

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウスの保護領がエクスパンスの憤慨した市民たちの報復攻撃によって滅んだとき、ローグトレーダーの多くの従者たちはこの強力な組織の中に聖域と新しい生き方を見出した。カスバリカ聖務団はその恩義を忘れなかった。
languages.original_text: When the von Valancius protectorate perished under the retaliatory strikes of resentful citizens of the Expanse, many servants of the Rogue Trader found sanctuary and a new way of life in this powerful organisation. The Kasballica Mission did not forget the kindness shown to it.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウスの保護領がエクスパンスの憤慨した市民たちの報復攻撃によって滅んだとき、ローグトレーダーの多くの従者たちはこの強力な組織の中に聖域と新しい生き方を見出した。カスバリカ聖務団はその恩義を忘れなかった。

languages.text: Von Valancius protektorası, Enginlik'teki kızgın vatandaşların misilleme saldırıları nedeniyle yok olduğunda, Hür Tacir'in birçok hizmetkârı bu güçlü organizasyona sığındı ve orada kendisine yeni bir yaşam kurdu. Kasballica Misyonu, yapılan iyiliği unutmamıştı.
languages.original_text: When the von Valancius protectorate perished under the retaliatory strikes of resentful citizens of the Expanse, many servants of the Rogue Trader found sanctuary and a new way of life in this powerful organisation. The Kasballica Mission did not forget the kindness shown to it.

traits.locale_text: Von Valancius protektorası, Enginlik'teki kızgın vatandaşların misilleme saldırıları nedeniyle yok olduğunda, Hür Tacir'in birçok hizmetkârı bu güçlü organizasyona sığındı ve orada kendisine yeni bir yaşam kurdu. Kasballica Misyonu, yapılan iyiliği unutmamıştı.
